Html:
Hello maps Master!

I'm trying to insert an polygon on my main map in an WPF version of the GMaps, but unsuccessfull.

When I try to use the polygon list availiable on the GPMarker its tell me that is an read only property.

Any ideas?

 

Tanks in advance.
add points to that list and call RegenerateShape

I'm trying to do it for 4 days, download 3 versions... sorry if I'm a little noob on this..

Any chance that you cut and paste some exemple?

 

 

Tks.

GMapMarker m = new GMapMarker(new PointLatLng());
m.Polygon.Add(new PointLatLng(54, 25));
m.Polygon.Add(new PointLatLng(54, 50));
m.Polygon.Add(new PointLatLng(30, 60));
m.Polygon.Add(new PointLatLng(-30, 40));
m.RegeneratePolygonShape(MainMap);
MainMap.Markers.Add(m);
